summary: Implements a residual convolutional block following the HiFi‑GAN V1/V2 design, applying two dilated convolutions with configurable kernel size, dropout and activation, and adding the original input to the transformed output to enable deep, stable audio generation networks.
business_intent: Provide a reusable neural‑network component for high‑fidelity generative adversarial models used in speech and audio synthesis, enhancing model depth and training stability through residual connections.
